frontmatter.title: Rustbitmap: .BMP manipulating library made in rust
frontmatter.description: Rustbitmap is a small rust library used to read, write and edit bitmaps. Written in Rust with the hopes of one day being used by a custom machine learning algorithm, it now covered in dust and cobwebs.
